name: papa-johns-sheese-bot
description: Check Papa Johns stores across the whole of the UK for presence of Vegan Sheese Pizzas

scripts.package: npm run package-prepare && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-prepare: npm run lint && npm run babel && cp -r stores package.json dist && cd dist && npm install --no-audit --production
scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir dist
scripts.local: npm run babel && cp -r node_modules dist && node dist/run.js
